text:
Question 66) One of the French remnants in the dance is the commands made by the gang marker. Its role is to announce the next steps of choreography. The abrasiler of French terms gave rise, for example, to Saruê (Soirée - Night Social Meeting, order for everyone to join in the center of the hall), anarriê (en arrière - back) and Anavã (en avant - forward).
The characteristic presented of this popular manifestation results from the following socio-historical process:
A) Massification of classical art.
B) rejection of elitist habits.
C) laicization of religious rituals.
D) Restoration of ancient customs.
E) appropriation of foreign practices.
